m_szDocTitle: Camp's clean car vehicle tax credits - SFGate
m_szDocSumamry: Camp's clean car vehicle tax credits Published 9:27Â am, Friday, March 25, 2016 By Stuart Frohm Midland Republican Dave Camp's proposed tax credits for buyers of hybrid and alternative-fuel vehicles are part of energy legislation the House passed Tuesday. Senate Republican leaders acknowledged they lack the votes to advance the energy bill. The $31 billion package approved Tuesday is like one that died in the Senate after the House approved it six months ago. The office of House member Camp said he proposes: * an $8,000 fuel cell tax credit, based on a combination of the weight class of the veh
